blogPost.title: As a chef, have you ever refused to cook something? Answer by Ian De Pagie. https://t.co/MHGiLCKOKd. https://t.co/jCrZnbwTGW
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 作为一名厨师，你有没有拒绝过做某件事？答案：Ian De Pagie。https://t.co/MHGiLCKOKd。https://t.co/jCrZnbwTGW。
作爲一名廚師，你有沒有拒絕過做某件事？答案：Ian De Pagie。https://t.co/MHGiLCKOKd。https://t.co/jCrZnbwTGW。

previous.title: COVID-19 has changed where and how people shop - what do you think will stick post-pandemic? Answer by @brian_dammeir, President of North America at @Adyen. https://t.co/pD6sjUnoHt https://t.co/IO1kMDx3o8

localize.full_text: COVID-19已经改变了人们购物的地点和方式--你认为流行病后会坚持什么？回答者为@brian_dammeir，@Adyen的北美总裁。https://t.co/pD6sjUnoHt https://t.co/IO1kMDx3o8。
COVID-19已經改變了人們購物的地點和方式--你認爲流行病後會堅持什麼？回答者爲@brian_dammeir，@Adyen的北美總裁。https://t.co/pD6sjUnoHt https://t.co/IO1kMDx3o8。

next.title: Are there “right” answers to the most commonly asked interview questions? If so, what are they? Answer by Tessa White, Founder and CEO of SHE Team and The Job Doctor. https://t.co/U2OjdKsacz https://t.co/zLyW6Qm3ZD

localize.full_text: 最常见的面试问题是否有 "正确 "答案？如果有，它们是什么？由SHE团队和The Job Doctor的创始人兼首席执行官Tessa White回答。https://t.co/U2OjdKsacz。
最常見的面試問題是否有 "正確 "答案？如果有，它們是什麼？由SHE團隊和The Job Doctor的創始人兼首席執行官Tessa White回答。https://t.co/U2OjdKsacz。
